chapters.title: Chapter 17: Deceptions
chapters.info: Moria Elward, p. 292 (257)—Sahra Covenry's taskmistress on the penance farm. She was not a harsh taskmistress, but Sahra did not come to the White Tower to work on a farm. She was killed by the same person who killed Sahra. See also Covenry, Sahra.
